title: Possessed Medkit

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, heal somebody, granting them powerful defense and cleansing them.
- Each night once you've been attacked, attack somebody, dealing a powerful attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The first time you are attacked, your defense drops to basic and you become angry, swapping your healing ability for a killing ability.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the good faction loses (this can win while dead).

desc:
Post 4802
*"If the doctor is dead, why are we still getting healed?"*
